General.Name: Tai-Tech Advanced Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: TAI-TECH Advanced Electronics Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and sells magnetic materials and inductive components in Taiwan. The company offers EMI suppression filters, common mode chokes, chip coils/inductors, Hi-current power inductors, SMD power inductors, LAN X'formers, low-frequency antennas, and balun filters. Its products are used in TV, automotive, networking, NB, smart phone, and simulation applications. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1, You 4th Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan
